entry.title: sagardewani/doggo: DOGGO is a lightweight AI-powered web app that allows pet owners to discover pet-related service vendors in their city. It groups vendors by city and filters them by service category (e.g., grooming, vet, boarding)
entry.content: DOGGO is a lightweight AI-powered web app that allows pet owners to discover pet-related service vendors in their city. It groups vendors by city and filters them by service category (e.g., grooming, vet, boarding)

entry.title: Edmon02/nextauth-simple: A lightweight, flexible authentication library for Next.js that works seamlessly with both App Router and Pages Router. Provides simple email/password authentication with secure session management.

entry.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! üêô‚ú®

entry.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. üêôüöÄ

entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
entry.content: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: theCalculatar/restViz: restViz is a lightweight library designed to create a dynamic web interface for Express applications. It automatically lists all defined API routes, providing an interactive interface explore and document your API.
